body_html:
Yes, ive verified that arm-linux-androideabi-gcc exists on my system.
But I'm not sure how to verify that its executable...

You would just run ls -la /home/flavia/Documents/ndk/toolchains/arm-linux-androideabi-4.9/prebuilt/linux-x86_64/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-gcc and make sure you have read/execute permissions, or simply try executing it directly from the command line.
body_text:
Yes, ive verified that arm-linux-androideabi-gcc exists on my system.
But I'm not sure how to verify that its executable...

You would just run ls -la /home/flavia/Documents/ndk/toolchains/arm-linux-androideabi-4.9/prebuilt/linux-x86_64/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-gcc and make sure you have read/execute permissions, or simply try executing it directly from the command line.
body:
```
Yes, ive verified that arm-linux-androideabi-gcc exists on my system.
But I'm not sure how to verify that its executable...
```

You would just run `ls -la /home/flavia/Documents/ndk/toolchains/arm-linux-androideabi-4.9/prebuilt/linux-x86_64/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-gcc` and make sure you have read/execute permissions, or simply try executing it directly from the command line.
